participants: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire

messages.message:
hi @georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire I responded in Stack Overflow, adding here too for visibility and to ping @Shivam about a Diff Checker API
> Looks like the document you reference is the API interface for the Diff app. I can see how this similarity in app names is confusing (hmmm, I seem to remember that you reported customer feedback about this diff checker vs document diff app, but can't locate that issue now).
> The Diff Checker app documentation covers the diff mode: "Select the Diff Mode: Line (default), Word, or Character." https://www.instabase.com/docs/reference/apps/diff-checker/
> I don't know if we have a Diff Checker API.

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: Hi @Barrie , Thank you for your comment! We do have a Diff API (https://instabase.com/docs/reference/apis/diffs/) that has a Text Diff example but it is line by line instead of word by word. The Diff Checker App can do word by word as well but I'm wondering if we have API support for that.

@georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire doesn't look like an API exists (yet?) for the Diff Checker app https://github.com/instabase/instabase/tree/master/webserver/api-server-apps/src/py/instabase/handler/api/v1
the diff checker api exists but just not in the right place  right now. I can talk with @Shivam about it. The url is `/apps/ocr/gen-ibdiff` currently

made a jira ticket. https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/FLOW-730

@georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire what’s the urgency of this?
